Font Configuration

Related

Accoutrement Type [external]

$system-font

scss 
$system-font: (
  'name': 'system',
  'stack': (
    'system-ui',
    'sans-serif',
  ),
  '300': (
    'local': $_system-local,
  ),
);

Font Preview system

css 
font-family: system, system-ui, sans-serif;
